thread.title: A joyful getaway for peace and tranquility.
thread.title_full: A joyful getaway for peace and tranquility. - Review of Lanzerac Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: whispers601
title: A joyful getaway for peace and tranquility.
text: Sorry we had booked too late for two days but enqjoyed the one day extremely and cannot wait to enjoy more time at the Lanzerac with friends or family. Beautiful spacious rooms, wonderfully furnished and although there are many rooms one gets the feeling of being private and secure. Just loved the place.
